comments: Year of birth given as 1926 in  S.Y. Bao et al., 'A Brief History of Plant Collection in Yunnan 1919-1950'  (1998)
examples: Cyclobalanopsis stewardiana var. longicaudata Y.C. Hsu, P.I. Mao & W.Z. Li in Acta  Bot. Yunnanica 5(4): 338 (1983); Sterculia pinbienensis H.T. Tsai & P.I. Mao in  Acta Phytotoax. Sin. 9: 200 (1964). Populus lasiocarpa var. longiamenta P.Y. Mao  & P.X. He in Bull. Bot. Res. N.-E. For. Inst. 6(2): 79 (1986).
source: IK. Dates from Index Herb. Sin.: 345 (1993).
